materials.raw_text:
Barium Sulfide (BaS) - 160 g 
 Bismuth Sulfide (Bi2S3) - 280 g 
 Yttrium Oxide (Y2O3) - 20 g 
 Sulfur (S) - 40 g

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh all materials accurately using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine 160 g of BaS, 280 g of Bi2S3, 20 g of Y2O3, and 40 g of S.

steps: 1. Carefully remove the solidified sample from the crucible.
